column4: I first noticed a similar error when trying to update but thought it was an error on the servers.
interesting - what have you done to break apt-get?
nothing that I would know of, I used it just minutes before to remove and reinstall cinelerra
I'm not an apt-get expert (I haven't managed to break it yet - nothing teaches you about an app like having to fix it!), but someone should be able to help  you - just be patient
